articles.description: Derek Carr's brother David says Michael Thomas and Tyrann Mathieu were some of the Saints veterans who helped lure the team's new quarterback:
articles.content: It turns out that getting Derek Carr to the New Orleans Saints was a team effort. His older brother and former NFL quarterback David spoke about the process that led to Carrs four-year contract with … [+2891 chars]

articles.content:
Thursday features a six-game main slate starting at 7:00 p.m. ET.
Let’s dive into some of the top plays on the slate using the FantasyLabs tools and metrics.
